channel.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]
channel.description:
Hello!
I have a track which I've been working on for quite a while. I'm pretty proud of it, and I keep wanting myself to post it. But I really want a repost on this. You will probably listen to this and think "what is this cow thinking he will never get a repost from this!?!?' and if you think that, please tell me. After all my stuff is still trash... :grin:
Anyway, I keep wanting to post this but I have a case of perfectionism. I want it to be the best I can do, so I never get around to posting it.
Any tips on how I could improve this would be great. Any feedback on this like 'lol this is trash' is great as well.
Please help this cow in need.
The track: https://app.auxy.co/projects/3__IkCgzmDG7u2yJq1mtNQ==
Thanks :+1:
Mr Mooo

item.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Oh ok, well I’m not sure then. Maybe experiment around but if something else doesn’t sound better than just leave it as is

Read full topic

item.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]

item.description:
Hmm… I added a strong kick on every beat but because the chords have ducker it sounds kinda odd…

Read full topic

Thanks. It sounds really good

item.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Yeah, sure! Maybe silk like this: https://app.auxy.co/projects/LzlK0m0XoPEBGDmTNdCoYw== To match the rest of the track it should probably have reverb so I took off the volume automation (because it cuts off the reverb) and replaced it with actual notes.

Read full topic

item.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
I think the drums need to be stronger at the drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Untitled - Mr Mooo [Project]
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Hey man, sounding great!

A few things… maybe make the drop a little more dramatic (I would probably have some exciting toms at the end of the build, but there’s other ways to do this). In the drop I would recommend a stronger kick and doing one on every beat. Also I like the idea of the piano melody thing that dances around in the, just make sure all the notes fit with the chords. And also I might choose a different sound for the siren.

Once again, good work! It’s a great track, like the inspirational vibe. Being kinda picky here, but just trying this give you some ideas of things that could maybe improve it a bit.

Read full topic
